覣字的基本解释

覣
wēi
和好的眼色。

覣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wēi］
［《廣韻》於為切，平支，影。］
(1)用眼色诱人。
(2)发声词。
(3)美好貌。

覣字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覣； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1135第30
【唐韻】於爲切【集韻】邕危切，?委平聲。【說文】好視也。　又【博雅】怒也。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】太子右監門率府副率士覣。　又【集韻】烏禾切，音倭。視貌。

覣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
覣字的起名意思

暂无。

覣
Basic explanation of words
覣
wēi
Winky winks.
覣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wēi］
["Guangyun" Yu Weiqi, flat branch, shadow. ]
(1) Be seductive with winks.
(2) Voiced words.
(3) Good looks.
覣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　覣; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1135 Page 30
[Tang Yun] Yu Weiqie [Ji Yun] Yong Weiqie, Wei Pingsheng. [Said the text] It looks good.　[Bo Ya] Anger too.　Another name. [Song History · Clan Table] The prince's right supervising the gate and the deputy rate of the mansion.　[Jiyun] Wuhe cut, sound widow. Look.
